name: Document Sentiment Analysis
description: Upload text documents/content to automate sentiment analysis and gain relevant insights

appStages.name: Introduction
SentimentAnalysis
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\n    \u003ch3\u003eDocument Sentiment Analysis\u003c/h3\u003e\n  \u003c/div\u003e\n  \n  \u003csection\u003e\n    \u003cul\u003e\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Upload a text document and press \u0027Execute\u0027 to start the analysis process.\u003c/li\u003e\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\n  \u003c/section\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html4",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Upload Text File",
      "description": "Upload a .txt file",
      "customClass": "mt-1 transparent icon-green m-4",
      "tableView": false,
      "storage": "base64",
      "webcam": false,
      "fileTypes": [
        {
          "label": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "key": "file",
      "type": "file",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "w1",
      "hidden": true,
      "key": "w1",
      "type": "well",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,
      "components": []
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Upload",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right btn-outline rounded ",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "read",
              "properties": {
                "updateTo": "textContent",
                "uploadType": "text",
                "successMessage": "File is Uploaded"
              },
              "logic": [
                {
                  "name": "Enable Button",
                  "trigger": {
                    "type": "javascript",
                    "javascript": "result \u003d (data[\u0027file\u0027].length);"
                  },
                  "actions": [
                    {
                      "name": "Enable action",
                      "type": "property",
                      "property": {
                        "label": "Disabled",
                        "value": "disabled",
                        "type": "boolean"
                      },
                      "state": false
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ],
              "type": "button",
              "event": "read-file",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "customClass": "m-1",
      "key": "columns",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Uploaded Content",
      "placeholder": "You may paste content here too",
      "autoExpand": false,
      "customClass": "mt-1 transparent m-4",
      "tableView": true,
      "calculateValue": "if(data.textContent \u0026\u0026 !data.textContent.startsWith(\"\\\u0027\")){\n  data.textContent \u003d \"\\\u0027\"+data.textContent+\"\\\u0027\";\n}",
      "key": "textContent",
      "type": "textarea",
      "rows": 5,
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "w2",

      "key": "w2",
